page.title: 04A TRAFFIC SURVEY
page.content: Our main road (A516) provides one of the few links between the M1 and M6 motorways. But it is not a satisfactory link, as a lot of heavy traffic goes through our village.It can be very dangerous as a lot of people need to cross the road. We have only just had a pelican crossing installed. A few days ago we went outside to make a traffic census. There were more cars in 15 minutes than any other vehicle; we counted 99 vehicles going away from Derby and 137 going to Derby. In one hour, about 9OO vehicles travelled through Etwall. Because of all that traffic we need a bypass but it would cost a lot of money and our bypass is low down on the Government's list of priorities.
